response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price tailored to our mutual interests. Considering its rarity and the benefits it can bring to you, I propose a transaction price of $800,000. This offer reflects my desire to see this product in capable hands while ensuring a fair return for its acquisition. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and financial planning. I look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 800000}
